question: What are the types of safety aspect in any plant
Which component used to select the required parameter level based on the application demand and pass the value to regulatory controller
Which component used to select the required parameter level based on the application demand and limit the value to regulatory controller?

answers.a: A component which will not allow the process parameter to cross a set limit
answers.b: A component which will allow the process parameter to cross a set limit
answers.d: The rate at which process variable is changing needs to be monitored and controlled
